meanings.definition: A place where salt is made by evaporating seawater.
meanings.sent1: The workers at the salterns were busy collecting the salt crystals.
meanings.sent2: Tourists visited the salterns to learn about the salt-making process.
meanings.sent3: The seagulls at the salterns seemed to enjoy the salty breeze.
meanings.sent4: The sun's heat turned the salterns into a shimmering field of white.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the vast salterns against the blue sea was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: A salt marsh or flat inundated with seawater.
meanings.sent1: The birds nested in the reeds near the salterns.
meanings.sent2: The fishermen cast their nets near the salterns to catch fish.
meanings.sent3: The children played hide-and-seek among the tall grasses by the salterns.
meanings.sent4: The moonlight reflected beautifully on the calm waters of the salterns.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the sea mingled with the earthy scent of the salterns.
